snippet: Nicole Hanley Mellon and Matthew Mellon decided early on in their relationship that they would collaborate on clothing, adding to their collective history in fashion.
abstract: Nicole Hanley Mellon and Matthew Mellon will introduce their own clothing line--Hanley Mellon--in fall of 2014; decided early on in their relationship that they would collaborate on clothing, adding to their collective history in fashion.
lead_paragraph: Nicole Hanley Mellon and Matthew Mellon decided early on in their relationship that they would collaborate on clothing, adding to their collective history in fashion.

headline.seo: The Story Behind the Hanley Mellon Clothing Line
headline.main: The Mellon Lifestyle as a Brand
